N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 578.1 - Background and intent

State Regulations
(a) The purpose of
these regulations is to establish standards and methods for determining rates
of payment made by government agencies pursuant to title 11 of article 5 of the

Social Services Law for services provided by a residential treatment facility
for children and youth licensed by the Office of Mental Health in accordance
with the provisions of Part 584 of this Title. (b) In order to be eligible for payments
pursuant to title 11 of article 5 of the Social Services Law, a residential
treatment facility for children and youth must meet the requirements of the

Mental Hygiene Law and the requirements of title XIX of the Social Security

Act, as identified in section
502.2
(d) of this

Title. (c) The rates of payment
established according to these regulations are intended to be adequate to meet
the costs of an efficiently operated facility. Notes
